content.rendered:
Directed by H. Vinoth

Written by H. Vinoth

Star Ajith Kumar (ACP Arjun Kumar). Huma Qureshi (Sophia). Kartikeya Gummakonda (Naren). Gurbani (Sara). Sumithra (Lakshmi).Yogi Babu . Selvaah (Policeman). G.M. Sundar (IG Arasu). Achyuth Kumar (Kodhandam). Raj Aiyyappa (Kutty). Vaishnavi Chaitanya (Arjun’s Sister). Pearle Maaney (Christina). Dhruvan (Amit). Chaitra Reddy (Latha). Pavel Navageethan (Selvam). Pugazh (Success Balu). Dinesh Prabhakar (DCP Rajangam)

Language Tamil

Producers Boney Kapoor

Production Bayview Projects. Zee Studios
